subject: vam vibration motor
description_text:
I recently ordered the SIMSONN PLUS X Sim Racing Pedals Haptic Reactor VAM
Vibration Motor (VAM 3 PCS PER SET). The package came without the screws
needed to install the haptics and 2 of the 3 motors are non responsive. I
didn't even get a chance to test how they work in sim.

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide us with your order number and we will resolve the issue or reissue it for you.

Order # 111-2600174-2752259

purchased through Amazon. thank you.

On Tue, Sep 16, 2025, 4:13 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Jordan Newman,  When you received the VAM units, were there two that did not work right away? This situation is very rare, as we conduct 100% testing before shipping to ensure every unit works properly. Please try swapping the two VAM units into ports that are functioning correctly. This will help determine whether the issue lies with the control box or settings, or if the VAM units themselves are defective. Doing this will help prevent a situation where replacements are sent but the problem remains unresolved.
